sen.j: 鴨鍋（かもなべ）は、鴨肉を白菜、ねぎ、豆腐などの野菜と一緒に煮込んで作る鍋料理のこと。
sen.e: A kamonabe is a duck hot pot with other ingredients such as hakusai cabbage, green onions, tofu and so on.
A kamonabe is a duck hot pot with other ingredients such as hakusai cabbage, green onions, tofu and so on.
A kamonabe is a duck hot pot with other ingredients such as hakusai cabbage, green onions, tofu and so on.

sen.j: 猟師などは自分で調達したマガモの肉を使うが、一般的に市販されている鴨肉は殆ど飼育されたアヒルあるいは合鴨である。
sen.e: Hunters use mallard meat which they hunt, but generally, duck meat on the market is either farm-raised duck or a hybrid from a wild or domestic duck is used for a kamonabe.
Hunters use mallard meat which they hunt, but generally, duck meat on the market is either farm-raised duck or a hybrid from a wild or domestic duck is used for a kamonabe.
Hunters use mallard meat which they hunt, but generally, duck meat on the market is either farm-raised duck or a hybrid from a wild or domestic duck is used for a kamonabe.

sen.j: 鴨肉からは良質の出汁が出てコクがあるが、コンブなどで軽く出汁をとってもおいしい。
sen.e: Though a duck meat itself produces a good quality broth with a strong flavor, it is also very tasty if a stock made of kombu kelp is added.
Though a duck meat itself produces a good quality broth with a strong flavor, it is also very tasty if a stock made of kombu kelp is added.
Though a duck meat itself produces a good quality broth with a strong flavor, it is also very tasty if a stock made of kombu kelp is added.

sen.j: 宮内庁の鴨の猟場として有名な千葉県市川市の新浜にある鴨料理専門店では、すき焼き風の鴨鍋が名物である。
sen.e: A restaurant specialized in kamonabe, located in Niihama, Ichikawa City, Chiba Prefecture, a town well-known as a hunting ground for the Imperial Household Agency, boasts of its sukiyaki-style kamonabe as its speciality.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: A restaurant specialized in kamonabe, located in Niihama, Ichikawa City, Chiba Prefecture, a town well-known as a hunting ground for the Imperial Household Agency, boasts of its sukiyaki-style kamonabe as its specialty.

A restaurant specialized in kamonabe, located in Niihama, Ichikawa City, Chiba Prefecture, a town well-known as a hunting ground for the Imperial Household Agency, boasts of its sukiyaki-style kamonabe as its specialty.

sen.j: これは、陶器の浅い鍋でまず鴨肉を焼き(鴨自体から脂がでるため油を引く必要は無い)、野菜と共に割り下で食べるというものだ。
sen.e: This is prepared, first, by pan-frying duck meat in a shallow pot made of earthware (because the duck itself contains fat, there is no need to use any cooking oil), and then cooking it with vegetables in stock mixed with soy sauce, sweet sake and sugar.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This is prepared, first, by pan-frying duck meat in a shallow pot made of earthware (because the duck itself contains fat, there is no need to use any cooking oil), and then cooking it with vegetables in stock mixed with soy sauce, sweet sake and sugar.

This is prepared, first, by pan-frying duck meat in a shallow pot made of earthware (because the duck itself contains fat, there is no need to use any cooking oil), and then cooking it with vegetables in stock mixed with soy sauce, sweet sake and sugar.

sen.j: 鴨の肉は一見油が多く感じられるが、牛肉などと違いコレステロールが少なく、不飽和脂肪酸やビタミン（A、B2）などが多く含まれている。
sen.e: Although duck meat may look greasy, unlike beef, its cholesterol level is low and it contains a high level of unsaturated fatty acid and vitamins (A and B2).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Although duck meat may look greasy, unlike beef, its cholesterol level is low and it contains a high level of unsaturated fatty acid and vitamins (A and B2).
Although duck meat may look greasy, unlike beef, its cholesterol level is low and it contains a high level of unsaturated fatty acid and vitamins (A and B2).

sen.j: 従って、健康上の懸念は比較的少ない。
sen.e: Thus it is considered to be more healthy than other meat.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Thus it is considered to be more healthy than other meat.
Thus it is considered to be more healthy than other meat.

sen.j: 鴨の充分なコクを楽しむ為、最後に雑炊にして食べる。
sen.e: To enjoy the richness of duck meat, rice will be added in the end so that it can be eaten as rice gruel.
To enjoy the richness of duck meat, rice will be added in the end so that it can be eaten as rice gruel.
To enjoy the richness of duck meat, rice will be added in the end so that it can be eaten as rice gruel.
